channel.title: How do i stop being so lazy
channel.description:
first of all im not fat. Lol
Well i just want to know how i can stop being so lazy. I want to make a new server. but im just too lazy to do it. If anyone has ever had that kind of thing before.
Anyways so What do you do to make yourself do something you dont want to?

item.title: How do i stop being so lazy
item.dc:creator: @Ventrozip Ventrozip
item.description:
@Ventrozip wrote:

You have to practice fighting the urge to slack. A good way to practice would be to tell yourself your going to do something and force yourself to follow through.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i stop being so lazy

item.title: How do i stop being so lazy
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:12, topic:336490”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=432857.msg3179238#msg3179238 date=1271165618]
Smoke weed. It’ll make you want to. Helps me when I’m lazy
[/quote]
Weed is a depressant. :P[/quote]

Well marijuana is the dried bud from the cannabis plant, and the two types of the cannabis plant are Sativa and indica. Cannabis Sativa will make you energetic, happy, outgoing, and motivated… indica is the type that produces the depressant marijuana which relaxes your body and puts you in a good mood and you feel great. So you could try some sativa but the chances of a dealer actually giving you what they claim it to be is not good so best bet is to grow to be sure. On topic, as a 3d modeler ive noticed if I don’t want to do something I can’t or if I do it will be shit so either don’t do it or get motivated.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i stop being so lazy

item.title: How do i stop being so lazy
item.dc:creator: @mod_inferno mod inferno
item.description:
@mod_inferno wrote:

thanks. i really want to do something for my new serv like frugoo. cheaters world and training world. But i just dont want to make the forums/site/both servers/set up the webclients. But i need to get it done.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i stop being so lazy

item.title: How do i stop being so lazy
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“mod inferno, post:1, topic:336490”]first of all im not fat. Lol

Well i just want to know how i can stop being so lazy. I want to make a new server. but im just too lazy to do it. If anyone has ever had that kind of thing before.

Anyways so What do you do to make yourself do something you dont want to?[/quote]Self contradiction ftw.

Just do something that you think would pay off later on. Since I make models, I find it fun to code everything for them. So just find something that you think would be cool to see or fun to do in your server, you’ll overcome the laziness.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i stop being so lazy
